text: Zuotian xianmu ge lun de jingyu de ren shuo:“Ni bujian ma? An la yao shi nage puren de jiyang kuanyu, jiu shi ta kuanyu;(yao shi nage puren de jiyang jiongpo), jiu shi ta jiongpo. Jiaruo meiyou an la dui women de enhui, ta bi shi women lunxian zai dimian xia. Ni bu zhidao ma? Gu en de ren, shi bu hui chenggong de.”
